column5: Hey all, Heading to a new lake ( for me ) Cordova Lake..  Any help on where to launch and what kind of fish are there ?? My cousin called me up and someone told him that this is a good lake for Walleye..  I told him I would look into it with the OFC board members and get back to him.. Not sure about this lake.. Just don't want to drive up, get there and be totally blind..  Any help & tips would be greatly appreciated...  Tiz

I will be heading up there to stay in a cottage next weekend. I've already asked for help on this board... here is the link. Some good info in there http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...hl=cordova+lake  remember to post a report and let me know how you do so i can prepare myself
